fields.name: title
fields.desc: The (optional) title of the dialog is displayed in a large font at the top of the dialog.

fields.name: content
fields.desc: The (optional) content of the dialog is displayed in the center of the dialog in a lighter font.

fields.name: actions
fields.desc: The (optional) set of actions that are displayed at the bottom of the dialog.

fields.name: scrollController
fields.desc: A scroll controller that can be used to control the scrolling of the [content] in the dialog.

fields.name: actionScrollController
fields.desc: A scroll controller that can be used to control the scrolling of the actions in the dialog.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of CupertinoActionSheetAction
desc: 【isDefaultAction】 : Whether it is selected by default  【bool】
